ch0148_00_matsuba/0101_0701_02_10:
Us? We’re great! I hope you have yourselves
another good day today.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0701_01_10:
In Johto, Pokémon have long been revered in
Ecruteak City.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0701_02_10:
There, it’s said that a rainbow-hued Pokémon
will come down to appear before a truly
powerful Trainer.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0701_03_10:
I train every day in hopes of someday being able
to meet that Legendary Pokémon!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0701_04_10:
The precious experiences I’m having here on Pasio
will bring me closer to that goal, too!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0702_02_10:
You know, if you put your nose to the grindstone
and train until you grow really strong...
ch0148_00_matsuba/0601_0702_03_10:
someday you might find yourself face-to-face
with a Legendary Pokémon!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0701_01_10:
Suicune, Entei, and Raikou are the subject of
legend in Ecruteak City.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0701_02_10:
I have this old friend Eusine who’s just enchanted
head over heels with Suicune.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0701_03_10:
Personally, I’d have to say I like Entei best...but
I can’t leave out Raikou... Guess I can’t make up
my mind.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0701_04_10:
If you ever have the pleasure of meeting them, I’d
be curious to hear which one you like best!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0702_01_10: You know, I once saw Entei. I mean like up close.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0602_0702_02_10:
I’ll never forget its eyes. It was like it could
see right through me, down into the depths
of my heart.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0701_01_10:
I’ve secretly trained at the Ecruteak Gym all
my life.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0701_02_10:
As a result, I can now see things that people
normally cannot!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0701_03_10:
The Ecruteak Gym attracts those who wish to attain
that type of mystical power. Mediums and the like,
you know?
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0701_04_10:
Lately, it’s been getting more attention from the
Hex Maniac community, which I’m happy to see—
they really liven up the place!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0702_01_10:
I hear some people find the Ecruteak Gym
a little scary.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0603_0702_02_10:
Perhaps I should brighten up the entryway with
a nice flower arrangement or something...
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0701_01_10: My whole life, I’ve been so focused on training.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0701_02_10:
Until I arrived on Pasio, I practically never had
the chance to interact with so many people.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0701_03_10:
Thanks to meeting all these sync pairs, I’ve
begun to see something that I’d never been
able to see before...
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0701_04_10:
The warmth that bonds people and Pokémon with
one another!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0702_01_10:
If you were to ask me to judge the strength of
your bond with your partner Pokémon, I’d say...
ch0148_00_matsuba/0604_0702_02_10:
Heh! Never mind—you look like you have a pretty
good sense of it already!
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0701_01_10:
Listen, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Whatever hardships you meet on the path ahead,
don’t you give up.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0701_02_10:
Even if it feels like your goals and beliefs are
getting further away. Even if you know you won’t
get a second chance at them.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0701_03_10:
No matter what setback comes your way, the
power to overcome it and keep moving forward
rests with you and you alone.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0701_04_10:
As long as you’re determined to hold true to your
convictions, you’ll always get back up no matter
how many times you’re knocked down.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0702_01_10: The future I saw was not my own...
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0702_02_10:
but that does not mean I have lost out on
my future.
ch0148_00_matsuba/0605_0702_03_10:
I will continue my training until I discover a new
future for me.
ch0148_00_matsuba/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, good timing. Here, I want you to have this.
ch0148_00_matsuba/1701_0701_02_10: Go ahead and use it, if it tickles your fancy.
ch0148_00_matsuba/1701_0702_01_10: It feels nice to give and receive gifts.
ch0148_00_matsuba/1701_0702_02_10:
Seeing the smile my gift put on your face makes
me want to give you another one!
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0701_01_10:
History plays an important role in the culture of
the Johto region.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0701_02_10:
Both Ecruteak City and Violet City are home to
some particularly old buildings.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0701_03_10:
Once when I was visiting Sprout Tower in Violet
City, I got practically swarmed by Gastly.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0701_04_10:
My friend Falkner was with me at the time.
It really took him by surprise.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0702_01_10: To tell you the truth, I think Gastly are pretty cute.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s kind of endearing how your hand passes
through when you try to pet them.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0701_01_10:
As Gym Leaders, it’s part of our job to award
badges to Trainers who’ve proven their skill.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0701_02_10:
It feels good to do so, since you’ve had the
pleasure of encountering a promising Trainer.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0701_03_10:
But that doesn’t quite take away the bitter taste of
defeat. Especially when we’re supposed to have
more discipline than anyone else...
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0701_04_10:
It’s complicated. I bet all Gym Leaders have
wrestled with these feelings in some form.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0702_01_10:
If you ever make it over to Johto, you should come
by the Ecruteak Gym for a battle!
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0702_02_10:
You’re an excellent Trainer. I can see you’re just
brimming with all sorts of possibilities.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0702_03_10:
I get the feeling you’ll be able to overcome the
barrier I present to you and ascend to even
greater heights.
ch0148_00_matsuba/2511_0702_04_10:
But don’t expect it to be easy! I’ll come at you
with all I’ve got!
ch0148_00_matsuba/3002_0701_01_10:
Ecruteak City’s famous for the Bell Tower.
What would Pasio’s signature landmark be?
There are so many to choose from...
ch0148_00_matsuba/3003_0701_01_10:
Volcanoes, glaciers, you name it. Pasio has so
many different terrains, I can never make up my
mind on where to train.
ch0148_00_matsuba/3004_0701_01_10:
Pasio is definitely lively, but I prefer the vibe in
Ecruteak City a bit more.
ch0148_00_matsuba/3005_0701_01_10:
What’s that following you?! Pasio isn’t supposed to
have any wild Pokémon, right?
ch0148_00_matsuba/3006_0701_01_10:
My partner Pokémon and I are more active at
night, but don’t push yourself to keep up with us
if you’re tired, all right?
